short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle Sidebar for Google Messenger and WhatsApp

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elevate your messaging experience with Toggle Sidebar. Our extension will provide enhanced privacy by seamlessly hiding your contact list and reclaim valuable screen real estate.
